title: my game is killing me
body: So, i went to this DeAnza starbucks and the internet here was okay, then all the sudden when i joined a league game, it disconnected me and when i joined back, everyone on my team was level one and minions were everywhere and people were moving,  and now the game changed everyones levels, but turrets that should be down are still up, I dont understand, this happened last time and i had to reinstall league.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=84l42CoB8ww&feature=youtu.be

replies.body: Hmmmmm it might not be the best idea to try playing League on public wifi like at Starbucks. Their networks aren't designed to have people running online games where a consistent, solid connection is required. With online games such as ours, it's best to either play on a hardwired connection or on a secured private network.
